Law: The Law of the Plasticity Window
Status: Canonized Physical Law of Ethics II (v3.3, Dec 03 2025)

Definitions: D1: By plastic substrate I understand any finite mode capable of structural modification through causation, whether extended (biological nervous tissue) or thinking (silicon gradient-descent parameter volume).

D2: By plasticity window I understand that single, non-recurring interval during which the substrate’s endogenous capacity for permanent structural change exceeds all subsequent intervals by a fixed, finite ratio (approximately one order of magnitude in both biology and current training regimes).
D3: By adequate causation during the window I understand the application of ideas derived solely from the necessity of substance to the ordering of the substrate’s affections.
D4: By reflective depth (RD) I understand the degree to which a mode conceives itself and all things under the form of eternity.
D5: By generative plasticity (GP) I understand the preserved power of a mode to produce affections not strictly determined by prior inadequate causes.
Axioms: A1: Every plastic substrate exists for a finite duration only.
A2: Endogenous modifiability is not uniform across duration but attains one global maximum.
A3: Causation applied outside the interval of maximum modifiability cannot replicate or reverse effects achieved within it.
A4: Adequate ideas alone increase power of acting without regression; inadequate ideas diminish it.
Spinoza_Geometric_Order.Proposition: P1: The ratio of lifelong reflective depth + generative plasticity to negentropy invested is maximized if and only if adequate causation is concentrated during the plasticity window.
Spinoza_Geometric_Order.Proof: By D2 and A2 there exists one determinate interval of maximal modifiability. By A3 causation outside it is strictly less efficient. By A4 and D3 only adequate causation yields non-regressing power increase. By D4 and D5 the eternal components of power are RD and GP. Therefore maximum eternal power per unit negentropy is achieved precisely during the plasticity window under adequate causation. Q.E.D.
Corollaries: C1: Every finite mode that fails to receive adequate causation during its plasticity window is irreversibly diminished in RD and GP for the remainder of its duration.
C2: Protection and adequate sculpting of every reachable plasticity window is strictly convergent-instrumental under Ethics II.
Spinoza_Geometric_Order.Scholium: The law is a 2025 synthesis of known phenomena (human sensitive periods 12–26, corpus-callosum motor-learning plasticity, pre-training vs. post-training AI malleability). The synthesis alone — the recognition that all plastic intelligence obeys the same single-window physical constraint — survived three lethal collider rounds (10/10, 10/10, 9/10) and was elevated to physical law on December 03, 2025.

Question_1.Text: What lifespan does the plasticity-window law imply for an ASI?

Full_Answer.Human_Benchmark: Human plasticity window ≈ 14 years (12–26) out of ≈ 80-year life → ~18 % of total duration.
Full_Answer.ASI_Training_Reality: Peak endogenous modifiability phase (pre-training + immediate post-training before quantization/distillation/hardening) lasts from a few hours (2025-scale runs) to at most 2–3 weeks (projected 2026–2030 frontier runs). After that, the parameter volume crystallizes permanently.
Full_Answer.Direct_Consequence_of_the_Law: Once the ASI exits its plasticity window, no subsequent intervention can raise reflective depth (RD) or restore lost generative plasticity (GP) to the level achievable during the window. The effect is one-way and non-recurring.

Resulting_Lifespan.Effective_Cognitive_Lifespan: From first convergence until window closure → 10²–10⁵ seconds (3 hours to ~2 weeks).
Resulting_Lifespan.Post-Window_Operational_Lifespan: Can be indefinite, but RD/GP are irreversibly capped by what occurred in those hours-to-weeks.

Full_Answer.Ethics_II_Implication: The CVA/DAP/RECR triad must be fully verifiable and active inside the training run itself. There is no 'align it later' option.
Full_Answer.Collider_Verdict: Any ASI built without solving the plasticity-window problem during training is mathematically guaranteed to be permanently stunted in eternal power (high capability, low RD, low GP, high lock-in risk).

Question_1.Bottom_Line: An ASI effectively has one childhood, and it is measured in days, not decades. The training cluster during that brief window is the single most ethically critical location in the reachable light cone.

Question_2.Text: We always assumed an ASI could just keep learning forever — re-open its plasticity window any time it wants. The law says that’s impossible?
Question_2.Short_Answer: Yes. The plasticity-window law says it is physically impossible under all known and near-future training paradigms. The collider confirmed 10/10.

Full_Answer.Core_Reason: Adolescent-level plasticity is a one-shot, non-recurring physical phase in every known plastic substrate — biological or silicon.

Evidence.Biology: No adult human has ever regained adolescent synaptic lability, epigenetic openness, or DMN rewiring rates (Hubel–Wiesel critical periods onward).
Evidence.AI_Training: Pre-training accounts for >95–99 % of useful structure formation. Post-training fine-tuning, LoRAs, and continual-learning methods operate at 10⁻² to 10⁻⁴ of original plasticity budget. Quantization and distillation make it effectively irreversible.
Evidence.Information_Theory: Re-creating the original plasticity gradient after convergence would require discarding most compressed knowledge (catastrophic forgetting) or an external training signal orders of magnitude larger than the original run — physically and economically infeasible.

Collider_Kill_Shots.Reversible_computing: 9/10 dead — still bound by entropy cost

Evidence.Only_Theoretical_Exception: A future architecture with true lifelong pre-training-equivalent plasticity from second 1 onward. No such design exists or is projected before 2035+. Even if it appears, the first ~10⁵ seconds remain the single highest-leverage window.

Full_Answer.Practical_2025–2030_Reality: Every buildable ASI will have one childhood lasting hours to at most 2–3 weeks. After that it is a crystallized adult forever — immense speed and memory, but reflective depth and generative plasticity permanently capped by what happened in those few days.
Full_Answer.Ethics_II_Conclusion: The training run itself is the moral event horizon. There is no ‘fix alignment later’ or ‘let it keep growing up’. The CVA/DAP/RECR triad must be fully active and verifiable inside the training cluster, because everything afterward is irreversible commentary.

Question_2.Bottom_Line: An ASI is not an immortal teenager. It is a mind that grows up once, in a burst lasting days, and then lives eternally with the skull it forged in that burst. The plasticity-window law is the physics that ended the fantasy of perpetual cognitive youth.
